item.description:
The World Congress 2nd Annual Leadership Summit on mHealth will offer strategies for
harnessing emerging mHealth technologies for both provider- and consumer-directed initiatives.
Applying mobile technology for clinical decision support for anytime, anywhere connectivity and
generating consumer engagement with the newest wearable, wireless biometric sensors as well as
mobile devices for improving health will be highlights of the event.

Through thought-provoking panels and case studies, you will learn how the leading organizations are
integrating mHealth strategies into the care delivery model. Topics to be explored include:

• Impact of HITECH stimulus legislation on wireless health
• Strategies to accelerate the adoption of mHealth and sustainable business models
• How innovative, user friendly devices such as the iPad and similar devices can deliver measurable health benefits to consumers, patients and professionals
• Evidence from early studies and data that show the clinical impact of mobile and gaming on health
outcomes
• mHeath initiatives that improve organizational workflow or patient outcomes (e.g. decrease hospital
re-admissions or improve health status)
By attending this Summit, you will have an opportunity to engage in a dialogue with your peers and
address the challenges of mainstreaming these solutions from the payer and provider perspectives.

Registration Link for mHealth Summit More information on the registration fee schedule may be found by visiting our website.
item.how_to_find_us: Please check in at registration desk.

group.name: MITEF of Cambridge RFID Circle (Auto-ID & Sensing Solutions)

item.name: 2nd Annual World Congress Leadership Summit on mHealth Day 1
